name: Metroidman (beta)
description: Story:In the future of 2069 a young poor man named rick katerack enlists in a program that will feed him and his family for life. But he didnt read the whole contract, so after a week of living the good life he is sent to space wearing a modified megaman suit and a new item called the databuster, a buster that when the bullets touch an enemy, microbots extract dna and replicate them creating datasamples.
